程序包 input_Control

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    CityButtonHoverController
    the hover function to the city buttons
    DocumentControl
    the document control that will update the sorter based on the text inputed
    FrameMouseDragController
    mouse listener added to the frame so that frame can be dragged
    MenuButtonHoverController
    the mouse adapter that change the color the font of a text of a button, when the mouse hover over the button
    MouseInput
    the mouse input to be able to add a city to the heat map
    PinButtonHoverController
    the pin button hover controller that set the label to be visible when mouse hover over
    SwitchButtonHoverController
    the button hover function for the button to change the icon
